com.viaoa.object
Class OAObjectDelegate

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.object.OAObjectDelegate

public class OAObjectDelegate
extends java.lang.Object

This is the central Delegate class that performs services for OAObjects. The other Delegate classes are specialized for specific tasks. This Delegate is used for multi-specific and misc functionality. The Delegates are designed so that the OAObject class can be light weight and have various functionalities built in.

Author:
vincevia

initialize

protected static void initialize(OAObject oaObj)
Called by OAObject constructor to assign guid and initialize new OAObject. If OAObjectFlagDelegate.isLoading() == false then initialize(...) will be called using the values from getOAObjectInfo()

Central method that is used when the object property Key is changed (OAObjectKey) and needs to be rehashed in all Hashtables that it could exist in.

getGuid

public static int getGuid(OAObject obj)

setAutoAdd

public static void setAutoAdd(OAObject oaObj,
                              boolean bEnabled)
Used to determine if an object should be added to a reference/master hub when one of it's OAObject properties is set. If false, then the object will not be added to masterHubs until this is called with "true" or when oaObj is saved.

Parameters:
oaObj -
bEnabled - (default is true)

getAutoAdd

public static boolean getAutoAdd(OAObject oaObj)
